title: Plainpalais Gold
summary: Make your smartwatch a REAL gold watch (square and round shape)
description: Let your watchface look like a real watchOmitsis presents the most carefully designed watch face for Android Wear. ‘Plainpalais ’ is the second of a series of watch faces created by T. Hugo, a professional watch designer based in Berlin, Germany.Plainpalais GoldPlainpalais – A homage to one of the epicentres of watchmaking, This is a place where reading the time is a philosophy. Tags: smartwatch, Face, wear, androidwear, watchface, watch face, smartwatchface, watch, white, luxury, elegantCompatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360  (Moto 360).
descriptionHTML:
Let your watchface look like a real watch

Omitsis presents the most carefully designed watch face for Android Wear. ‘Plainpalais ’ is the second of a series of watch faces created by T. Hugo, a professional watch designer based in Berlin, Germany.

Plainpalais Gold

Plainpalais – A homage to one of the epicentres of watchmaking, This is a place where reading the time is a philosophy.

Tags: smartwatch, Face, wear, androidwear, watchface, watch face, smartwatchface, watch, white, luxury, elegant

Compatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360 (Moto 360).
comments: Moto 360 classy I have a champagne moto and this looks the best of ALL gold faces. One problem is it seems to use a lot of battery and somehow facer is also draining my battery while using this face, but not through facer?! Still, happy I bought it.
Nice. The MOST sophisticated look on ASUS ZEN watch on the market now! It would be state of the art if somehow to add battery and missing calls.
Refund I installed it and don't like it, but there is no refund option
Off centered Love the dim mode, but the second hand is off centered in my LG R. Hopefully the developer will fix this soon
Not as shown in pictures Where is the version of the watch face without the frame?
recentChanges: The pivot point of the second hand is now centered
